name: Death Camping
description:
- Procedural weapons.

- Diferent weapon stats.

- Procedural forest.

- Local score board.

Game made in 21 hours (1h per day * 3w)

Controls:

- Movement: W,A,S,D.

- Run: shift.

-Aim and shoot: mouse.

How play:

Survive and kill many as you can.

If an enemy is alive for a time, his stats (health and speed) will be increase.

Small box = ammo.

Big box = new weapon.

Recomendation: Use headphones, that can help you to determine

the enemy position.
